column3: Latest;Phnom Penh: A municipal official of the Ministry of Environment killed himself by jumping from the fourth floor of the Environment Ministry building
column6: Chamkar Mon district.------UPDATE: According to the latest report
column10: was suffering from a physical illness. He was an administrative officer in the Ministry of Environment.------The cause of the suicide is unknown and police are investigating.------https://kbn.news/archives/125178
